Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power

package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim
     
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power.lists
     
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power.models
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    PowerDatacenter
    PowerDatacenter is a class that enables simulation of power-aware data centers.
    PowerDatacenterBroker
    A power-aware DatacenterBroker.
    PowerDatacenterNonPowerAware
    PowerDatacenterNonPowerAware is a class that represents a non-power aware data center in the context of power-aware simulations.
    PowerHost
    PowerHost class enables simulation of power-aware hosts.
    PowerHostUtilizationHistory
    A host that stores its CPU utilization percentage history.
    PowerVm
    A class of VM that stores its CPU utilization percentage history.
    PowerVmAllocationPolicyAbstract
    An abstract power-aware VM allocation policy.
    PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationAbstract
    An abstract power-aware VM allocation policy that dynamically optimizes the VM allocation (placement) using migration.
    PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationInterQuartileRange
    A VM allocation policy that uses Inter Quartile Range (IQR) to compute a dynamic threshold in order to detect host over utilization.
    PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationLocalRegression
    A VM allocation policy that uses Local Regression (LR) to predict host utilization (load) and define if a host is overloaded or not.
    PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationLocalRegressionRobust
    A VM allocation policy that uses Local Regression Robust (LRR) to predict host utilization (load) and define if a host is overloaded or not.
    PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationMedianAbsoluteDeviation
    A VM allocation policy that uses Median Absolute Deviation (MAD) to compute a dynamic threshold in order to detect host over utilization.
    PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationStaticThreshold
    A VM allocation policy that uses a Static CPU utilization Threshold (THR) to detect host over utilization.
    PowerVmAllocationPolicySimple
    A simple VM allocation policy that does not perform any optimization on VM allocation.
    PowerVmSelectionPolicy
    An abstract VM selection policy used to select VMs from a list of migratable VMs.
    PowerVmSelectionPolicyMaximumCorrelation
    A VM selection policy that selects for migration the VM with the Maximum Correlation Coefficient (MCC) among a list of migratable VMs.
    PowerVmSelectionPolicyMinimumMigrationTime
    A VM selection policy that selects for migration the VM with Minimum Migration Time (MMT).
    PowerVmSelectionPolicyMinimumUtilization
    A VM selection policy that selects for migration the VM with Minimum Utilization (MU) of CPU.
    PowerVmSelectionPolicyRandomSelection
    A VM selection policy that randomly select VMs to migrate from a host.
